resources.string: Using the Google Chrome app to search or browse websites can put your privacy at risk. Google is known to use data like the terms your search for or the links you interact with to create a profile on you.\n\nRead more about Googleâ€™s policies here.
Protect yourself by browsing with DuckDuckGo
